short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds Meiosis Tracer to Chrome DevTools

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Meiosis-Tracer is a development and debugging tool that traces, rewinds, and replays snapshots of streams in a web application. You can also directly enter your own snapshots and send them onto streams.
